sourcesContent:
List of characters

  • Name : {{character.name | titlecase}}
    Aliases :
    • {{alias | titlecase}}

    • {{title | titlecase}}
    Gender : {{character.gender | titlecase}}
    Culture : {{character.culture | titlecase}}
    Born : {{character.born | titlecase}}
    Died : {{character.died | titlecase}}
    Father : {{getName(character.father)}}
    Mother : {{getName(character.mother)}}
    Spouse : {{getName(character.spouse)}}
    Allegiances :
    • {{allegiance | titlecase}}
    Books :
    • {{book | titlecase}}
    POV books :
    • {{povBook | titlecase}}
    TV series :
